Community Rules

  • 1
    Be RespectfulNo vulgarity, hate speech, or personal attacks. Treat everyone with kindness.
  • 2
    No PoliticsKeep discussions focused on millets, health, and nutrition.
  • 3
    Provide ValueAsk genuine questions and provide helpful, accurate answers.
  • 4
    No SpamDo not post promotional content or repeated messages.

Violating these rules may result in account suspension. Let's keep this a safe space for everyone.
